Class Customer

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.Customer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Customer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The Class Customer. Contains all methods exclusive to the customer usertype
